SIGH Finance (modified by SIGH FINANCE)","methods":{"activateInstrument(address)":{"details":"activates a _instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument*"}},"deactivateInstrument(address)":{"details":"deactivates a _instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument*"}},"disableBorrowingOnInstrument(address)":{"details":"disables borrowing on a instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the instrument*"}},"disableInstrumentAsCollateral(address)":{"details":"disables a instrument as collateral","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the instrument*"}},"disableInstrumentStableBorrowRate(address)":{"details":"disable stable rate borrowing on a _instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument*"}},"enableBorrowingOnInstrument(address,bool)":{"details":"enables borrowing on a instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the instrument","_stableBorrowRateEnabled":"true if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this instrument*"}},"enableInstrumentAsCollateral(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"enables a instrument to be used as collateral","params":{"_baseLTVasCollateral":"the loan to value of the asset when used as collateral","_instrument":"the address of the instrument","_liquidationBonus":"the bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*","_liquidationThreshold":"the threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized"}},"enableInstrumentStableBorrowRate(address)":{"details":"enable stable rate borrowing on a instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the instrument*"}},"freezeInstrument(address)":{"details":"freezes an _instrument. A freezed _instrument doesn't accept any new deposit, borrow or rate swap, but can accept repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and redeems","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument*"}},"initInstrument(address,uint8,address)":{"details":"initializes an instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the instrument to be initialized","_interestRateStrategyAddress":"the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*","_underlyingAssetDecimals":"the decimals of the instrument underlying asset"}},"initInstrumentWithData(address,string,string,uint8,address)":{"details":"initializes a instrument using iTokenData provided externally (useful if the underlying ERC20 contract doesn't expose name or decimals)","params":{"_iTokenName":"the name of the iToken contract","_iTokenSymbol":"the symbol of the iToken contract","_instrument":"the address of the instrument to be initialized","_interestRateStrategyAddress":"the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*","_underlyingAssetDecimals":"the decimals of the instrument underlying asset"}},"refreshLendingPoolCoreConfiguration()":{"details":"refreshes the lending pool core configuration to update the cached address*"},"removeLastAddedInstrument(address)":{"details":"removes the last added instrument in the list of the instruments","params":{"_instrumentToRemove":"the address of the instrument*"}},"setInstrumentBaseLTVasCollateral(address,uint256)":{"details":"emitted when a _instrument loan to value is updated","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument","_ltv":"the new value for the loan to value*"}},"setInstrumentDecimals(address,uint256)":{"details":"updates the _instrument decimals","params":{"_decimals":"the new number of decimals*","_instrument":"the address of the _instrument"}},"setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress(address,address)":{"details":"sets the interest rate strategy of a _instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument","_rateStrategyAddress":"the new address of the interest strategy contract*"}},"setInstrumentLiquidationBonus(address,uint256)":{"details":"updates the liquidation bonus of a _instrument","params":{"_bonus":"the new value for the liquidation bonus*","_instrument":"the address of the _instrument"}},"setInstrumentLiquidationThreshold(address,uint256)":{"details":"updates the liquidation threshold of a _instrument.","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument","_threshold":"the new value for the liquidation threshold*"}},"unfreezeInstrument(address)":{"details":"unfreezes a _instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument*"}}},"title":"LendingPoolConfigurator devdoc.author: Aave, SIGH Finance (modified by SIGH FINANCE)

disableInstrumentStableBorrowRate(addres.details: disable stable rate borrowing on a _instrument

params._stableBorrowRateEnabled: true if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this instrument*

enableInstrumentAsCollateral(address,uin.details: enables a instrument to be used as collateral

params._baseLTVasCollateral: the loan to value of the asset when used as collateral
params._liquidationBonus: the bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*
params._liquidationThreshold: the threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized

enableInstrumentStableBorrowRate(address.details: enable stable rate borrowing on a instrument

freezeInstrument(address).details: freezes an _instrument. A freezed _instrument doesn't accept any new deposit, borrow or rate swap, but can accept repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and redeems

params._instrument: the address of the instrument to be initialized
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*
params._underlyingAssetDecimals: the decimals of the instrument underlying asset

initInstrumentWithData(address,string,st.details: initializes a instrument using iTokenData provided externally (useful if the underlying ERC20 contract doesn't expose name or decimals)

params._iTokenName: the name of the iToken contract
params._iTokenSymbol: the symbol of the iToken contract
params._instrument: the address of the instrument to be initialized
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*
params._underlyingAssetDecimals: the decimals of the instrument underlying asset

refreshLendingPoolCoreConfiguration().details: refreshes the lending pool core configuration to update the cached address*

removeLastAddedInstrument(address).details: removes the last added instrument in the list of the instruments

setInstrumentBaseLTVasCollateral(address.details: emitted when a _instrument loan to value is updated

params._ltv: the new value for the loan to value*

setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress.details: sets the interest rate strategy of a _instrument

params._rateStrategyAddress: the new address of the interest strategy contract*

setInstrumentLiquidationBonus(address,ui.details: updates the liquidation bonus of a _instrument

params._bonus: the new value for the liquidation bonus*

setInstrumentLiquidationThreshold(addres.details: updates the liquidation threshold of a _instrument.

params._threshold: the new value for the liquidation threshold*

devdoc.title: LendingPoolConfigurator contract

userdoc.notice: Executes configuration methods on the LendingPoolCore contract. Allows to enable/disable instruments, and set different protocol parameters.*
